sslProtocol.description: Optional SSL method to use, default is "SSLv23_method". The possible values are listed as https://www.openssl.org/docs/man1.0.2/ssl/ssl.html#DEALING-WITH-PROTOCOL-METHODS , use the function names as strings. For example, "SSLv3_method" to force SSL version 3.

secure.description: Set to true for both control and data connection encryption. (default: false)

keepPasswordInMemory.description: Keep password into internal variable for reconnection (default: false)

port.description: Port number of FTP/SFTP server. If it is zero, use the default port

privateKey.description: Private key file for SFTP connection. Use OpenSSH format. If it is non empty, password will be ignored

passphrase.description: Password for an encrypted private key.

connectionTimeout.description: Disconnect from FTP/SFTP server after timeout(ms) (default: 60000)

fileNameEncoding.description:
Filename encoding for FTP. Encoding with iconv-lite.
 See all supported encodings: https://github.com/ashtuchkin/iconv-lite/wiki/Supported-Encodings

ignoreWrongFileEncoding.description: Suppress of the file encoding error assumption

autoDownloadRefreshTime.description: Milliseconds. Auto refresh after this value when set 'autoDownload' as true. default is 1000

blockDetectingDuration.description: Milliseconds. If FTP connection is blocked for this value reconnect and retry action. default is 8000

refreshTime.description: Milliseconds. re-list remote files After this duration. 'autoDownload' is affected by this property. default is 1000

showGreeting.description: Show greeting message of Remote Server

ftpOverride.description: It will pass to connect function of nodejs ftp package

sftpOverride.description: It will pass to connect function of nodejs ssh2 package
